title: Hanni El Khatib x Freddie Gibbs – “Satin Black” (OFFICIAL AUDIO STREAM)
description:
“Satin Black” is the first single off of the third Converse CONS compilation, CONS EP Vol. 3, with three more tracks being released throughout Spring 2015. The song was written by Hanni El Khatib and Freddie Gibbs, with Khatib handling production as well. 

Produced by: Hanni El Khatib
Music by: Hanni El Khatib
Lyrics by: Hanni El Khatib and Freddie Gibbs
Vocals by: Hanni El Khatib and Freddie Gibbs
